page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: Hill Top Farm, Frettenham, has for the last year been run for charity. Grange Farm is the oldest, it is one thousand years old. Most of the farmers own their farms, but the others rent or manage them. The crop which is the most popular is{sugar beet. The least popular crop is{wheat. The average farm has about three hundred acres. The farm with the most land is Grange Farm which has eight hundred acres. Some farmers have been farming in this area for forty years .Most farms employ five labourers. Their children also help on the farm. Most of the farms had{dairy herds and{cattle.
